entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
